How Reviews Work

Reviews in the APR-CV system are collected from patient feedback after completed treatment plans or sessions. These reviews help maintain quality of care and provide insights into patient satisfaction.

Review Collection
  • Patients are invited to leave reviews after completing treatment plans
  • They can rate your services on a scale of 1-5 stars
  • Patients can leave detailed comments about their experience
Responding to Reviews
  • You can respond to any patient review
  • Your responses are public and visible to anyone who can see the review
  • Professional, thoughtful responses can build patient trust
Review Display
  • Your overall rating is an average of all your reviews
  • Reviews are displayed on your public profile
  • Reviews may affect potential patients' decision to choose you as their therapist
